title: Vadiance Supplement Concentrate - Vadiance
description: Vadiance is pure spring water highly infused and concentrated with vital life energy from an advanced new process. Taking only a small amount of Vadiance (a couple of droppers daily) helps you become your best self, physically, emotionally, mentally, and spiritually by rebalancing your vital energies. Benefits can include: Clearing of Negative Emotions & Energies, Greater Calm & Emotional Balance, Lower Stress, Higher Energy & Focus, Letting go of past Traumas, Inner Peace, More Restful Sleep, and More.
